Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: selfish mining is like running a marathon to get to pull the lever once at the casino, and you have to run another marathon to pull it again. KMD notarization puts a time limit on how fast the selfish miner has to run the marathon, increases risk and hence the cost of selfish mining. Just another benefit of DPoW
